narrations.value: Welcome to your July Usage Report on the past 30 days of Doordash’s use of SaaS Magic prepared on behalf of Amy Layton. --thanks--
We looked at your income & expenses over the past quarter.
Here is a summary of the recruitment process for the past quarter.
You extended an offer to 85 candidates or 11% of the total 750 applicants.
Sam Pollock’s usage grew the most, at 23% month over month.
The average time spent per user on your team is up --up-- 13% since the previous month.
We notice that Ian Layton is using SaaS Magic the most on your team, spending 72 minutes last month. --wow--
In this Cast we will discuss your account usage and performance.
We will share best practices, along with new product recommendations.
And finally, we will also share how to reach the team.
Your expenses will rise by <cast:mark>11%</cast:mark> in this quadrant.
and the majority of your expenses are for renting a home and a vehicle.
In the last 30 days, your team spent 397 minutes in SaaS Magic, --up-- up 35% from the previous month.
I can walk you through the flow step-by-step. Click “Start Now” when you are ready and close to your camera.
Troubleshooting is simple and only takes a few minutes.
